articles.description: Parle-G Girl Replaced: You must have been seeing the iconic girl on the biscuit packet of Parle-G for years. However, biscuit manufacturer Parle surprised internet users by sharing a post on Instagram on Wednesday. Zervaan J Bunshah is an Indian content creat…
articles.content: Zervaan J Bunshah is an Indian content creator, comedian, and social media influencer known for his witty commentaries and Parsi caricatures. (Pic- Instagram/Parle)
